item.title: RainbowDuino – I’m comming
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: Yeah! Just ordered a bunch of stuff from the Seeedstudio Shop, my new favorite Arduino parts dealer. I’m really looking forward to get the RainbowDuino into my hands. I’ve already order thier 8×8 RGB LED Matrix at ebay which is really promissing… Unfortunately they are located in china to shipping takes ages ;-( More soon […]
item.content:encoded:
Yeah! Just ordered a bunch of stuff from the Seeedstudio Shop, my new favorite Arduino parts dealer. I’m really looking forward to get the RainbowDuino into my hands. I’ve already order thier 8×8 RGB LED Matrix at ebay which is really promissing… Unfortunately they are located in china to shipping takes ages ;-( More soon to come ….

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z_JuFGAYHq0[/youtube]
